body.p:
JOHN M'CLAREN,
Attorney at Law,
OFFICE,
NO. 74 GRANT STREET,
One Door below the Court House,
PITTSBURGH, PA.
Collections made and promptly remitted.

Pittsburgh, March 25 1865
Hon. Thomas E. Bramlette
Governor of the State of Kentucky.
The undersigned would respectfully make application for the appointment of, Commissioner, for the, State of Kentucky

Hon. Thos. E. Bramlette
Governor of Kentucky,

Wilson McCandless
U S Judge
Edwin H. Stowe
Associate Law Judge
Com Pleas
Allegheny Co Pa

Comr Deeds
Pennsylvania
John McClaren
apptd & Comd 29th Mch/65
